name: Conviction
description:
HAVE YOU THE CONVICTION TO FIGHT OFF THE UNHOLY SPAWN!

Stuck in the endless darkness of the world, you must ward off a mysterious cult from summoning their god. Explore the outskirts of a mysterious village in the middle of nowhere as you fight your way through hordes of unholy spawn. Uncover the cult's secrets and stop them for good.

Prove your conviction as you play as a jaded, cynical, priest with nothing but burning rage and a desire to decimate the cult!

  • Dark and Dreary Atmosphere – the world around you is veiled in eternal darkness...watch your step…
  • Relentless Campaign – fight through fifteen levels over the course of three chapters!
  • Destructive Arsenal – use a variety of weapons to decimate all that crosses your path, from a humble revolver to cleansing your foes with firey Molotov's.
  • Secrets & Extra Content – discover secret collectables in each level and you’ll be rewarded with extra items such as health, ammo, or access to secret levels!
